testCaseName: Should throw exception when adding device with duplicate UID

labels.name: suite
labels.value: Device Repository SQL Implementation Integration Tests

name: Should throw exception when adding device with duplicate UID

statusDetails.message:
PreparedStatementCallback; SQL [INSERT INTO core.device (uid, client_uuid, device_name, device_description) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)]; ERROR: insert or update on table "device" violates foreign key constraint "device_client_uuid_fkey"
  Подробности: Key (client_uuid)=(b9f1750f-807b-491c-b4d9-ec82c3b6cc9e) is not present in table "client".
